page.title: 19Food Production.
page.content: On Foxley Farm, part of which comes in our area,{vegetable crops}are being grown. These include carrots,spinach, cabbage and spring onions at present but other crops will be grown in rotation. We saw tractor trailers laden with some of these crops and wanted to know where they were going. We visited the{packing sheds}which are at another farm owned by the same farming family although it was outside our area.When the crops arrive they are stored in ice bank coolers until they are prepared for market.The crops are tipped onto a moving belt where they are sorted and packed into trays, boxes or polythene bags.When sealed in the packs they are weighed and priced before being sent to{supermarkets. The farmer also has a stand at{Covent {Garden and a farm shop.}Some produce is sent to{local shops}unpackaged.
